Hobbies.name: Gaming
Hobbies.reason: After I had moved to my new house I got A old pc on my room. A friend of my had Rollercoaster tycoon 2 but he didn't play it so got it from him. Because of this game I started to play more on the pc later game more and more games and better compter and then a real gaming pc

Hobbies.name: Flying
